text: Gullan Marianne, Princess Bernadotte, Countess of Wisborg (n√©e Lindberg, later Tchang; 15 July 1924 - 16 May 2025), also known as Princess Marianne Bernadotte, was a Swedish actress and philanthropist. In 1961, she married Sigvard Bernadotte, the second son of Gustaf VI Adolf of Sweden. Since the death of Gunnila Bernadotte in 2016, she is the last surviving aunt of King Carl XVI Gustaf of Sweden, Queen Margrethe II of Denmark and Queen Anne-Marie of Greece. On 15 July 2024, she became the first official member of the Swedish Royal Family to turn 100 years old. Bernadotte died at a retirement home in Stockholm, on 16 May 2025, at the age of 100. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1924 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Swedish royalty Category:Swedish movie actors Category:Swedish models Category:Philanthropists Category:Princes and princesses Category:Swedish centenarians Category:People from Helsingborg
title: Marianne Bernadotte
